title: Custom E-liter 3K
paragraphs: The Custom E-liter 3K(NA), or Custom E-Litre 3K(EU/OC), is a main weapon in Splatoon. It is the Custom version of the E-liter 3K.
The Custom E-liter 3K is nearly identical in appearance to the E-liter 3K. However, the Custom E-liter 3K has a sticker bearing the Custom logo on the ink tank.
The Custom E-liter 3K was released on 17 June 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It comes with Squid Beakons and the Kraken.

The Custom E-liter 3K is an E-liter 3K modified with custom parts for a unique appearance! Use the Squid Beakons to send your teammates on ahead while you find a good spot to back them up. If anyone gets too close, give 'em a taste of Kraken! This set is well suited for defensive battlers.(NA)

- 2.5 Demonstration
- The Custom E-liter 3K is a heavyweight weapon.

- Ink consumption scales from 2.55% to 30% depending on the charge level.
The full-charge ink consumption of 30% allows players to fire 3 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).
- The Custom E-liter 3K cannot store its charge.

- It takes 1.57 seconds to fully charge the weapon.
When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.7 seconds.
- Shots cannot pierce through enemies.
- When charging while moving, the player's movement speed is set to 0.15 units per frame.
- Damage scales from 40 to 100 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the damage is 180.
- Shot velocity scales from 12 to 49.86 units per frame depending on the charge level. At full charge, the velocity is 64 units per frame.
- Shot distance scales from 90 to 272 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the distance is 340.
- The full-charge ink consumption of 30% allows players to fire 3 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).
- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.7 seconds.
- ▼ Maximum damage without full charge: 120.0 → 100.0
- ▼ Special gauge loss: 50% → up to 60%
- ▼ Swim speed decreased by about 10%.
- ▼ Range when not fully charged reduced by about 20%.
- ▲ Time taken to fully charge reduced by about 6%.
